languages.text: "Путь ее начался в глубинах флагмана, в сумрачных туннелях грузовой магистрали — там же должен начаться и твой. Пройдя его, ты станешь ближе к Завету Паутины. Ближе к Неумирающему. И к пониманию смерти".

"Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."
languages.original_text: "Путь ее начался в глубинах флагмана, в сумрачных туннелях грузовой магистрали — там же должен начаться и твой. Пройдя его, ты станешь ближе к Завету Паутины. Ближе к Неумирающему. И к пониманию смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Her path began in the flagship's bowels, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where your path must begin as well. This journey will bring closer to Ahn'shini. To the Undying One. To understanding death."

"Her path began in the flagship's bowels, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where your path must begin as well. This journey will bring closer to Ahn'shini. To the Undying One. To understanding death."

"Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

languages.text: « Son périple a commencé au plus profond du vaisseau, dans les sombres tunnels de la ligne de fret, et c'est là que vous devrez vous rendre pour entamer à votre tour le voyage qui vous rapprochera du fil de la Toile. De l'Immortel. De la compréhension de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

traits.locale_text: « Son périple a commencé au plus profond du vaisseau, dans les sombres tunnels de la ligne de fret, et c'est là que vous devrez vous rendre pour entamer à votre tour le voyage qui vous rapprochera du fil de la Toile. De l'Immortel. De la compréhension de la mort. »

« Son périple a commencé au plus profond du vaisseau, dans les sombres tunnels de la ligne de fret, et c'est là que vous devrez vous rendre pour entamer à votre tour le voyage qui vous rapprochera du fil de la Toile. De l'Immortel. De la compréhension de la mort. »

languages.text: «Su camino empezó en las profundidades de la nave insignia, en los oscuros túneles de la línea de carga, y allí es donde debe comenzar su camino. Este viaje le acercará al hilo de la Red. Al Inmortal. A comprender la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

traits.locale_text: «Su camino empezó en las profundidades de la nave insignia, en los oscuros túneles de la línea de carga, y allí es donde debe comenzar su camino. Este viaje le acercará al hilo de la Red. Al Inmortal. A comprender la muerte».

languages.text: 「彼女の道は旗艦の奥深く、貨物線の暗いトンネルから始まって、あなた様の道もそこから始まるのです。この旅は「ウェブ」の糸に近づけてくれる。不死の者に近づけてくれる。死への理解に近づけてくれるのです」
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の道は旗艦の奥深く、貨物線の暗いトンネルから始まって、あなた様の道もそこから始まるのです。この旅は「ウェブ」の糸に近づけてくれる。不死の者に近づけてくれる。死への理解に近づけてくれるのです」

languages.text: “她的旅途始于旗舰深处，位于货运区域阴暗的隧道之中，而你的旅程也必须从那里开始。这段旅程会让你更加接近丝线的脉搏，更加接近不死之神，也更加接近死亡的真理。”
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

traits.locale_text: “她的旅途始于旗舰深处，位于货运区域阴暗的隧道之中，而你的旅程也必须从那里开始。这段旅程会让我们更加接近丝线的脉搏，更加接近不死之神，也更加接近死亡的真理。”
“她的旅途始于旗舰深处，位于货运区域阴暗的隧道之中，而你的旅程也必须从那里开始。这段旅程会让我们更加接近丝线的脉搏，更加接近不死之神，也更加接近死亡的真理。”

languages.text: "Ihr Pfad begann tief im Flaggschiff, in den dunklen Tunneln der Frachtroute, und dort muss auch der Eure beginnen. Diese Reise bringt Euch näher zum Faden des Netzes. Näher zum Todlosen. Näher zum Verständnis des Todes."
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Pfad begann tief im Flaggschiff, in den dunklen Tunneln der Frachtroute, und dort muss auch der Eure beginnen. Diese Reise bringt Euch näher zum Faden des Netzes. Näher zum Todlosen. Näher zum Verständnis des Todes."

languages.text: "Onun yolu; sancak gemisinin derinliklerinde, yük hattının karanlık tünellerinde başlar. Senin yolun da oradan başlamalı. Bu yolculukla Ağ'ın ipliğine, Ölmeyen'e ve ölümü kavramaya daha da yaklaşacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Her path began deep within the flagship, in the dark tunnels of the freight line, and that is where yours must begin as well. This journey will bring you closer to the thread of the Web. Closer to the Undying One. Closer to understanding death."
